meanings.sent1: She kept miswriting the word 'beautiful' as 'beutiful'.
meanings.sent2: He often miswrites his name as 'Jonh' instead of 'John'.
meanings.sent3: The miswriting on the sign caused confusion among the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her miswriting of the address led the package astray.
meanings.sent5: Miswriting important details can lead to misunderstandings.

meanings.sent1: The miswriting document had many errors that needed correction.
meanings.sent2: She received a miswriting letter with her name misspelled.
meanings.sent3: Despite the miswriting label, the package reached its destination.
meanings.sent4: The miswriting words on the page seemed to dance around.
meanings.sent5: The miswriting note made it difficult to understand the message.
